price: ពួកគេស្ថិតនៅតាមលំដាប់ថ្នាក់ខុសៗគ្នាចំពោះ អល់ឡោះ។ ហើយអល់ឡោះមហាឃើញនូវអ្វីដែលពួកគេប្រព្រឹត្ដ។
arabic: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
